plot: After reading a letter saved since childhood, a woman decides to change her world in one day. Flashbacks lead to memories while the message saved in her fist pushes her to do what she never dared.
title: Desde Los Ojos De La Inocencia
plot_es: After reading a letter saved since childhood, a woman decides to change her world in one day. Flashbacks lead to memories while the message saved in her fist pushes her to do what she never dared.
original_name: Desde Los Ojos De La Inocencia
plot_en: After reading a letter saved since childhood, a woman decides to change her world in one day. Flashbacks lead to memories while the message saved in her fist pushes her to do what she never dared.
